text: tatha usee kee nishaaniyon mein se hai ki aap dekhate hain dharatee ko sahamee huee. phir jaise hee hamane usapar jal barasaaya, to vah lahalahaane lagee tatha ubhar gayee. nishchay jisane jeevit kiya hai use, avashy vahee jeevit karane vaala hai murdon ko. vaastav mein, vah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
